titles: The Christian arte of thriving, whereby a man may become rich to God, or, A sermon vpon Matth.6.33 preached by the right reuerend father in God, George, Lord Bishop of Derry.
author: Downame, George, d. 1634.
notes: "First seeke the kingdome of God, and his righteousnesse, and all these things shall be added vnto you."
Item at reel 591:10 identified as STC 7109a.
Reproductions of originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Harvard University Library.
